ImprovedMonorailTrainDistance1.name: Improved Monorail Train Distance I

ImprovedMonorailTrainDistance5.description: Increases range a monorail's Propulsion Platform can travel to 3500 blocks on a single tank of mana!

ImprovedManaCapacity1.name: Improved Mana Capacity I
ImprovedManaCapacity1.description: Increases Mana Tank capacity by 100%. Mana Tanks will need their mana filled less often. Effects mana machines and mana tanks.

ImprovedManaCapacity2.name: Improved Mana Capacity II
ImprovedManaCapacity2.description: Increases Mana Tank capacity by 200%. Mana Tanks will need their mana filled less often. Effects mana machines and mana tanks.

ImprovedManaCapacity3.name: Improved Mana Capacity III
ImprovedManaCapacity3.description: Increases Mana Tank capacity by 300%. Mana Tanks will need their mana filled less often. Effects mana machines and mana tanks.

ImprovedManaCapacity4.name: Improved Mana Capacity IV
ImprovedManaCapacity4.description: Increases Mana Tank capacity by 400%. Mana Tanks will need their mana filled less often. Effects mana machines and mana tanks.

ImprovedManaCapacity5.name: Improved Mana Capacity V
ImprovedManaCapacity5.description: Increases Mana Tank capacity by 500%. Mana Tanks will need their mana filled less often. Effects mana machines and mana tanks.

Artificer1.name: Artificer
Artificer1.description: Artificers opens up magical machines that run on mana and the Artificer job to maintain them! Machines are crafted in the advanced crafter.

Backpack1.name: Backpack
Backpack1.description: Gives you a backpack that you can carry items in.

SkillEquiptmentResearch1.description: Allows you to craft +1 skill equipment.

SkillEquiptmentResearch2.name: +2 Skill Equipment
SkillEquiptmentResearch2.description: Allows you to craft +2 skill equipment.

MaxMagicItems1.name: Max Magic Items
MaxMagicItems1.description: Allows you to carry an addional magic item. Must an ower of the colony when researched. Stacks with multiple colonies.

MaxMagicItems2.description: Allows you to carry an addional magic item. Must an ower of the colony when researched. Stacks with multiple colonies.

Sorcerer1.name: Sorcerer
Sorcerer1.description: Unlocks Sorcerer to create magical item for your colony.

SkilledLaborer1.description: Increases chance of getting skilled laborers when settlers to find your colony. Skilled laborers have an increased chance to discover rare items when crafting and a chance to do bonus damage as a guard.

ArmorSmithing1.description: Allows crafting of copper armors for your colonists.

ArmorSmithing2.name: Armor Smithing II - Bronze
ArmorSmithing2.description: Allows crafting of bronze armors for your colonists.

ArmorSmithing3.name: Armor Smithing III - Iron
ArmorSmithing3.description: Allows crafting of iron armors for your colonists.

ArmorSmithing4.name: Armor Smithing IV - Steel
ArmorSmithing4.description: Allows crafting of steel armors for your colonists.

SwordSmithing1.name: Sword Smithing I - Copper
SwordSmithing1.description: Allows crafting of copper swords for you and your colonists.

SwordSmithing2.name: Sword Smithing II - Bronze
SwordSmithing2.description: Allows crafting of bronze swords for you and your colonists.

SwordSmithing3.name: Sword Smithing III - Iron
SwordSmithing3.description: Allows crafting of iron swords for you and your colonists.

SwordSmithing4.name: Sword Smithing IV - Steel
SwordSmithing4.description: Allows crafting of steel swords for you and your colonists.

Knights1.name: Knights
Knights1.description: Allows for placing knight patrols and crafting Patrol Flags.

Machines1.name: Machines!
Machines1.description: Allows crafting of machines for crafters. Adds the machinist job.

ImprovedDurability1.name: Improved Durability I
ImprovedDurability1.description: Increases all machines durability by 10%. Machines will need repairing less often.

Apothecaries1.name: Apothecary
Apothecaries1.description: Apothecary creates magical reagents such as mana and bandages for you and your colonists.

AdvancedApothecary1.name: Advanced Apothecary
AdvancedApothecary1.description: Apothecaries learn how to make Treated bandages for powerful healing.

Mana1.name: Mana!
Mana1.description: Unlocks mana that can be used for magical things!

Teleportation1.name: Teleportation!
Teleportation1.description: Unlocks Teleporters! Can be crafted, placed in pairs. One side must be maintained by a machinist.

BuildersWand1.name: Builders Wand
BuildersWand1.description: Unlocks the Builders Wand! Used to lay out a large number of blocks at a time. Can lay out 750 blocks before it breaks.

BetterBuildersWand1.name: Better Builders Wand
BetterBuildersWand1.description: Upgrades the Builders Wand to lay out 1000 blocks before it breaks!

BetterBuildersWand2.name: Even Better Builders Wand
BetterBuildersWand2.description: Upgrades the Builders Wand to lay out 1250 blocks before it breaks!

BetterBuildersWand3.name: Super Builders Wand
BetterBuildersWand3.description: Upgrades the Builders Wand to lay out 1500 blocks before it breaks!

BetterBuildersWand4.name: Ultra Builders Wand
BetterBuildersWand4.description: Upgrades the Builders Wand to lay out 1750 blocks before it breaks!

BetterBuildersWand5.name: Perfect Builders Wand
BetterBuildersWand5.description: Upgrades the Builders Wand to lay out 2000 blocks before it breaks!

Elementium1.name: Elementium
Elementium1.description: Unlocks Elementium. Elementium is transmuted by Apothecary and is used to create powerful magic items and elemental weapons.
